full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): NO TITLE [@001B THUGS BSKYED TSUL NI MDO SDE BSKAL BZANG LAS, ,NGA NI SNGON TSE DBUL POR GYUR BA'I TSE, ,DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA SH'AKYA THUB DE LA, ,'JAM GANG ZHIG GI DBUL BA BYAS NAS KYANG, ,DANG PO BYANG CHUB TU NI SEMS BSKYED DO, ,]
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @051A *, ,('DI NI BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON MES RANG LO NYER GSUM PA LA LHA LDAN SMON LAM GRVA SKOR GYI DUS GTUGS PAS RTZAS BLO 'DZIN NGOS, ,RDOR MI GSAL BA KHA 'GENG DGOS RNAMS DPE GLOG GANG BGYIS DRAN THO RAGS BTZAM SU GZIS SU BTAB PA LAS, ,PHYIS DPE RIM PAR 'KHYAD CHOS GRVA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN @051B BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DKA' RAM 'DZAN GRVA'I CHOS GRVA BA RNAMS NAS RTZANG PA A PAN SKYED CHE BAR 'DUG PAS PAR DU 'KHOD DGOS ZHES PAR YIG BTAB ZIN 'DUG KYANG, ,SPYIR DANG PO NAS RANG GI BRJED THO TZAM DU BSAM STE TSIG SBYOR SOGS RTZOM PA'I LUGS SU MA BYAS SHING SHING LHAG PAR DE SABS RTZOD PA CHA TSANG MA SONG BAS GONG 'OG MA 'BREL BA LTA BU RE GNYIS 'DUG PA BYAD CUNG ZAD BGYIS YOD KYANG, ,DNGUL BLO GROS CAN RNAMS KYIS DPYAD PAR MDZAD NA LEGS SO, ,)
author_simple: DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME,
